subject: Coaches and Managers
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox, losers of 91 games for the first time since 1966, traveled to New York this week for what could be the final three games that Bobby Valentine manages in Major League Baseball.
snippet: The Red Sox, losers of 91 games for the first time since 1966, traveled to New York this week for what could be the final three games that Bobby Valentine manages in Major League Baseball.
